page.title: 17New Developments.
page.content: Despite what may appear, at times, as a gloomy picture, there are{ new {developments} taking place in Heywood. Within the last two years, a large supermarket has opened, and new shops are planned for the centre. We have a fine{Civic Hall,}which is used by the many amateur societies that flourish in the town. The local cricket team are having a very successful time and amateur sport continues to grow. Industrially, there are problems, but new industries are developing, particularly warehousing industries.{ {The Textile Industry,}though reduced in size, is still a force in the area, and continues to lead the way in the development of {new Technology.} Socially, steps are being taken to overcome the problems of unemployment and a rise in drug taking, politically the future is somewhat unsure.
